entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Debugging Blazor WASM in Edge Browser - missing files #50349
  • Blazor Webassembly - Debugging Breaks after OIDC Authentication #50346
  • [Blazor] Wait until the initial page loads completely before activating interactive components #50344
    8.0-rc2
  • TagHelpers (asp-controller, asp-action) don't generate link if a Variable is used to set Endpoint Route Pattern #50343
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #50342
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #50341
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, fortunes_ef #50340
  • HTTPS Error using IIS Express #50335
  • Change PropertyNameCaseInsensitive's default value to false. #50333
  • Differential response mechanism for Blazor enhanced navigation, utilizing a configurable page store. #50329

Closed

  • Request Delegate Generator generates incorrect InterceptsLocation attribute when `Map...` call is on a newline relative to route builder #50348
  • Revamping form-binding in minimal APIs and MVC #49543
    8.0-rc1
  • WebApiAot ProjectTemplate add OpenAPI (Swagger) support #50134
  • Obtaining aspnet parameter binding metadata #50300
  • Perf regression: caching, single_query #50270
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #50330
  • Perf regression: plaintext #50331
  • Exception filters with ordering executing decending. #49372
  • Streaming rendering is blocked by CSS Hot Reload (possibly by browserlink) #47608
    8.0-rc2
  • Support certificate auto-rotation in Kestrel #32351
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Fix WebAssembly hot reload deltas cache #48836
    8.0-rc2
  • Issue rendering IHtmlContent in Razor component #50334
  • Close circuit when there are no remaining interactive Server components #48765
    8.0-rc2
  • Add ambiguity breaker (hook) in DefaultEndpointSelector #49547
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #50307
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes #50320
  • MapIdentityApi email confirmation links uses relative instead of absolute URLs #50296
    8.0-rc2
  • Clarify auth plan for Blazor web project template #48772
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Update area-owners.md #50339
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Model to 7.0.0-preview3 #50218
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-rc2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `f42da0e` to `460ae98` #50336
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Use absolute URLs for confirmation emails #50297
    area-identity, 8.0-rc2
  • Update area-owners.md #50327
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove Visual Studio Extension development workload requirement from `.vsconfig` #50202
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2252614 #49575
    area-mvc
  • added builder config - appsettings to BlazorWeb template #50208
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add exclusion for `.vsconfig` file to CI #50203
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Styling Update for Header and Footer Elements #50130
    community-contribution, feature-templates, area-ui-rendering
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Ignore properties without public setters during form mapping #50318
    area-blazor
  • Consume IHostEnvironment.ContentRootFileProvider from CertificatePathWatcher #50246
    area-networking
  • [Draft] Watch certificates using polling and checksums #50172
    area-networking
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-networking, area-routing
  • [DRAFT] Consider symlinks when watching certificate file paths #50074
    area-networking
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
    area-networking
  • Remove default logging scope from ASP.NET Core #44873
    breaking-change, pending-ci-rerun, needs-breaking-change-announcement, area-networking
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
